Version
-------

- Update version in the following files:
    - setup.py
    - avpy/avMedia.py
    - CHANGES.txt
    - docs/source/conf.py

Version spec
------------

https://www.python.org/dev/peps/pep-0440

Pypi release
------------

python setup.py sdist upload -r pypi

(see http://peterdowns.com/posts/first-time-with-pypi.html)
